name: Up Scope
overview: In Up Scope the player simulates the controls of a submarine console to orient the periscope and target enemy ships with torpedoes. In each stage the goal is to destroy the submarine hunter in a limited amount of time. Other ships can be destroyed for bonus points. The intercom will alert the player where the hunter is. If the submarine hunter manages to get close, it will begin to launch depth charges at the submarine and the player will be required to dodge them and avoid sea mines before going for the next attack. The game ends when the time is up or the submarine has been destroyed.
